io.catalyze.sdk.android

Class Query

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.catalyze.sdk.android.CatalyzeObject
      • io.catalyze.sdk.android.Query
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Query
extends CatalyzeObject
    Use this class to make API calls to query a custom class, and to interact with the data results from these queries. To perform a query operation, first instantiate an instance of Query with the name of the Custom Class to query and an authenticated user. Next set field, searchBy, pageNumber and pageSize as desired, then call execute query.
    See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • executeQuery

        public void executeQuery(CatalyzeListener<Query> callbackHandler)
        Run a query with the current settings of this isntance of Query
        Parameters:
        callbackHandler - CatalyzeListener that must expect a Query on successful callback. This Query will be a reference to this instance of query, and will have been updated to so that a call to getResults will return a list containing the results form the last executed query
